text: Sônia Braga (born June 8, 1950) is a Brazilian and American actress. She acts mostly in movies. She starred in The Rookie and Moon over Parador. She has also been in a few television programs, including CSI: Miami. She is the aunt of the Brazilian actress Alice Braga. ==Other websites== Category:American movie actors Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:People from Paraná State
title: Sônia Braga
